# Appendix

## Individual responses in transfer phase

```{r apx-transfer, fig.cap="Individual responses in transfer phase", out.width="100%", out.height="80%", cache=TRUE}
transfer %>% 
  ggplot(aes(img_x, img_y, fill = response)) +
    facet_wrap(~subj_id) +
    geom_tile(size = .2, color = "white") +
    scale_fill_manual(values = c("#ac0634", "#525252")) +
    theme_subjects +
    theme(legend.position = "none",
          strip.text = element_blank(),
          panel.spacing = unit(2, "pt"))
```

## Individual probability judgements

```{r apx-probability, fig.cap="Individuals probability judgementabout their decision", out.width="100%", out.height="80%", cache=TRUE}
transp %>% 
  mutate(
    cert_unscaled = ifelse(prob < 50, 100 - prob, prob),
    certainty = scales::rescale(cert_unscaled, c(0, 100))
  ) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(img_x, img_y, fill = certainty)) +
    facet_wrap(~subj_id) +
    geom_tile(size = .2, color = "white") +
    scale_fill_viridis_c(
      # guide = guide_colorbar(
      #   title.position = "top",
      #   title.hjust	= .5,
      #   label.position = "bottom"
      # )
    ) +
    theme_transfer +
    theme(legend.position = "none",
          legend.key.height = unit(.3, "lines"),
          legend.text = element_text(),
          strip.text = element_blank(), # element_text(size = 8),
          panel.spacing = unit(2, "pt"))
```
